        Returns a WriteValue for the provided eventId and provided argument. This is a specialized one-parameter implementation of toParameters(ParameterizeWireKey, Object...) which avoids creation of an array and lambda.
        Parameters:
        eventId - to used
        arg - single argument
        Returns:

        protected <T> T attempt(@NotNull

        Parameters:

        Returns:
